title: 07/27/2021 - Best of The Herd
itunes:title: 07/27/2021 - Best of The Herd
description:
Colin rejoices at the return of Aaron Rodgers to Green Bay, saying it's a big win for everyone but there are four things to be worried about going into this season. Gregg Popovich creates a strawman argument to excuse USA losing from their loss to France. Simone Biles deserves to take a step back if she's not in the right head space even on a global stage. Plus, Colin brings you an early Top 10 NFL Herd Hierarchy!


Guest: Dave Wannstedt

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
